name: Dune Buggy Trax Heavy Duty
description:
Drive your Dune Buggy Trax on beautiful offroad terrains to the given locations.Dune Buggy Trax Heavy Duty is an exciting, realistic iPhone and iPod Touch Game that totally engages you in thrilling Dune Buggy Trax Adventure.This Game Allows you to race your way through the Dunes for high speed Dune Buggy Trax Adventure.
The awesome graphics and realistic gameplay will make you drive over these awesome sand dunes time and time again. With Game Center integration, you can check how you're doing compared to your friends, and the rest of the world.

Game features

G_reat sound effects and motivational sports music
R_ealistic Dune Buggy Trax
E_xtremely powerful Dune Buggy Trax
A_ddicting game play
T_imeless Terrains

G_ame Center Leaderboard
A_mazing 3D graphics
M_ind Blowing Offroad Adventure
E_ngaging
